p: The owner administered an 80 mg tablet (considered for 20‚Äê40 kg BW) for flee control to the puppy with a body weight of 2.5 kg. Five hours later, the dog started to show fasciculations and tremor. Eight hours after ingestion, the dog showed the first of two generalized seizures. Permanent salivation and respiratory distress occurred. The dog was presented 19 hours after ingestion.
